ranging-type
tone-frequency-hybrid
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the configured tone frequency in Hz, where the range is 100 kHz to 1.5 MHz. It is applicable only in case ranging-type is ‘hybrid’. If ranging-type ≠ 'hybrid', the value of this parameter shall be flagged as 'undefined'.

parameter.name: code-length-hybrid
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the configured length of the code that is modulating the ranging tone for resolving the range ambiguity. The code length range is 5 to 24. It determines the distance range within which ambiguity can be resolved. It is applicable only in case the ranging-type is ‘hybrid’. If ranging-type ≠ 'hybrid', the value of this parameter shall be flagged as 'undefined'.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (2) OF IntUnsigned where the first element reports the value of the parameter 'l' while the second element reports the value 'k' (see CCSDS 414.1-B-1 for the exact specification). l and k are integer values constrained by the following expression: k=6 and l={1,2,…,12,16,32, or 64} or l=2 and k={8,9, or 10}).
parameter.name: chip-rate-pn
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the chip rate of the forward link ranging signal as a function of the forward link carrier frequency. The exact definition is given in CCSDS 414.1-B-1. This parameter is applicable only in case the ranging-type = ‘pseudo noise’. If ranging-type ≠ 'pseudo noise', the value of this parameter shall be flagged as 'undefined'.

parameter.typeDefinition: SEQUENCE (SIZE (1)) OF IntUnsigned { t2B-sine (0) , t2B-square (1) , t4B-sine (2) , t4B-square (3) }
